transcript:
Customer: The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait or call again later. Aap ne jis vyakti

Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir.

Executive: Haan sir, thoda samay hai aapke paas?

Customer: Kya?

Executive: Samay hai aaj se video mein?

Executive: Haan ji haan ji sir boliye boliye sir boliye koi nahi main active pe bol liya.

Customer: Achcha achcha. Kya matlab aapke inquiry calls ko badhana hai na thoda?

Executive: Haan ji.

Executive: Main aapki properly are dekho abhi aap ek kaam karo IndiaMART kholo fatafat.

Customer: Yaar main active pe to hu kaise khol du? Abhi abhi abhi abhi aa rakhi hai 25 minute pehle aayi hai Jaipur Rajasthan mein finger door double type table.

Executive: Haan haan bol bol deta hu main.

Executive: Haan usi ke liye keh raha hu kholo zara.

Customer: Ek second yaar.

Customer: Dik gayi?

Customer: Jaipur ki aa rakhi hai abhi table wali Jaipur Jaipur.

Customer: Uthao uthao contact karo isko.

Customer: Main karta hu baat ek baar.

Customer: Isse baat karo baki sab main aapko

Customer: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. Tusi jis vyakti naal gal kar rahe ho.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Haan ji haan ji.

Customer: Haan sir. Wo ye keh raha hai meri ho chuka hai paid list ke andar ek do do pehle ho gaya meri.

Customer: Oye yaar main usko call bhi kar liya wo bolta mera ho gaya hai.

Customer: Wo keh raha hai ho gaya hua hai keh raha hai ek ghante pehle ho gaya hamara kaam to.

Customer: Pata nahi usne bola abhi mere ko.

Executive: Kaise ho gaya?

Customer: Mere ko yahi to panga hai na IndiaMART pe yahi to panga hai. Wo saale ya samne wale bevkuf banata hai ya hum log bevkuf hai. Abhi aap usko call karo aapko aapko pata lag gaya main utha liya. Maine baat bhi kar liya wo bhi aapko aa gaya hoga. Usse pucho ki sir aap ek ghante pehle kaise ho gaya aapko abhi 26 minute hue hain. Main abhi number bhejta hu. Number bhejna number bhejo aap mere ko whatsapp pe number mera.

Customer: 9529

Customer: 9529 464909.

Executive: 464909. Kya naam hai sir?

Customer: Iska naam to bhi true caller pe kuch ho nahi hua hai kyuki maine beech mein baat uthai thi na. Main dekh main dekh raha hu ruk jao uske baad. Haan. Ashish ji.

Customer: Ashish Yadav.

Customer: Haan sir lo kar lo baat.

Executive: Ashish Yadav. Ab baki aapka concern close kar du?

Customer: Haan maine kab kiya aapka?

Executive: Ye aapne call kiya tha din bhar mein dekho 9 se 9.

Customer: To aapne uthaya hi nahi na us samay.

Executive: Achcha achcha to ye band kar du?

Customer: Kar do kar do yaar main kya kahunga ab.

Executive: Dekho ab ye wali lead aayi hai aur main dekh raha hu jo thodi der abhi office mein hu baitha hua.

Executive: Theek hai.

Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says one of his paid leads closed early.

- Customer says executive did not answer call earlier.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to contact the lead.

- Executive offered to close the customer's concern.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, paid subscription, follow up
